name: Alone (itch) (Two Felt Games)
description:
Help this survivor keep his sanity in this lonely wasteland. Use his rope to move obstacles as you move through the city.

Turn off all the speakers.

User your rope to swing across the big hole.

Put a rock on the spring board with you and then whip it off to fling yourself to the back set of platforms (where there is another speaker to turn off that you can't reach otherwise).

Works Best with a Controller

Move Player : Left Stick

Move Crosshair : Right Stick

Jump :A (Xbox) Or X (PS)

Press Speaker Button : X (Xbox) or Square (PS)

To use rope : when CrossHairs turn green, Press and Hold R1 to lasso objects. 

While Holding R1, Use the Right Stick to whip objects in the direction pressed.

Discovered too late to fix - whipping stuff around with the mouse does not work. Sorry! Works great with a controller!

Works with Mouse and Keyboard

Move Player : A,D

Move Crosshair : Mouse

Jump : Space

Press Speaker Button : LCtrl

To use rope : when CrossHairs turn green, Click and hold left mouse button to lasso objects. 

While Holding Left Click, move the mouse to whip objects in the direction moved.

For Brackeys game jam:

We focused on art, animation, sounds - overall game feel. Then we put it all together as a really short and sweet, simple puzzle platformer. Move objects around to reach and turn off the speakers. Move an object onto the springboard with you and then move it off to launch yourself onto the back level. But most of all...

Have fun throwing items around! Just be sure to shut off the pesky speakers and then you'll be able to relax :D
